name: Nutrexplosion
description:
It's a super simple and fun educational game that teaches you about a health and balanced diet.  Use left and right arrow key to move the player left and right, eat food falling from the sky. To win, collect 10 of each essential nutrition: carbohydrates(bread), vitamin(apple), protein(chicken leg). But avoid the sweet sweet cake because it has trans fat and it slows you down! The game ends when you eat more than 5 cakes.

This game is developed by M.E.LaZerte High School Computer Science Club. Huge thanks to everyone who contributed, students and teachers.
